title: Kelly Brook causes furious row with boyfriend — after drunkenly ­licking lapdancer’s boob
content: MODEL Kelly Brook sparked a furious bust-up with her ­boyfriend — after drunkenly ­licking a lapdancer’s boob. Pals said the 38-year-old playfully got to grips with the woman dancer on a visit to a strip club as she and friends enjoyed a raucous night out. Kelly Brook snapped with a lapdancer while lover Jeremy Parisi… via Kelly Brook causes furious row with boyfriend — after drunkenly ­licking lapdancer’s boob — The Scottish Sun
